name: Brief Karate Foolish
description: Here comes a new epic of live action fighting game!! With 60fps smooth action, sexy and deadly guys fly into air and bounces their flab!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows95/98/XP/7/8.1 Processor: Pentium 133Mhz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: On board Graphics Card DirectX: Version 7.0a Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows95/98/XP/7/8.1 Processor: PentiumII 800Mhz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: On board Graphics Card DirectX: Version 7.0a Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: Pros +Free +Underwear  Cons -Lotions and jellies make the controller slippery -Flickery graphics on GTX 970
The controls are kinda screwd, so let me give you a hand in this super funny game:   G=Right J=Left Z=light Punch X=light Kick C=Great Punch H=Crouch H+C= Slide Kick (example)

Basically Mortal Combat, but with influences from some of everyone's favorite japanese characters. I played this game for maybe 2 minutes and I already know it is a real catch, a sure keeper. I think that with support for every operating system, not including Mac or Linux, like it has will really push it's potential to become a game loved by my family and yours for generations. The art style, the music, and the character design are some of the greatest I have experienced in these 11 years I have been alive. Thanks for reading this, and have a good thanksgiving to those celebrating late. Amen, god bless, Papa Johns.

Best game ever! What a gem of a game! The storyline is immersive, music is the best game music I've heard, controls are intuitive. More people need to play this game, I can't believe they made it free because I would have paid good money for this game.
Enough internet for today
you take under tale and mix it with mortal kombat then take out undertale make it 50% more gay its this game
It was brief, but amazing, 8) out 10
I'm a huge Tekken fan, and I must say, this really scratch my itch for fighting games on PC.

This is a 1 v 1 fmv fighting game. Welcome dear breif user. We are here to test your willingness to fight as some of these down right ridiculous fighters. The neko man, the Zoro wannabe and more. The music is suprisingly good, the humor is great, the controlls are better then some of the 1 v 1 fighting games from back in the day, the motion capturing is good and the breifs are white. The game has a problem with the fact that it can send you out into your desktop and you can see it at times in the game if it starts bugging out. The controlls are hard to find naturally so look at the manual for this game if you don't want the hardships with figuring it out like I had to. No acheivements or badges and no cost. So if you like 1 v 1 fmv fighting game with alot of humor then this free game might be something for you. Have fun, enjoy and wash your breifs :)
the games is good, the only thing that is missing is online battles so you can play with friends
I played as a man who resembled my friend in his 20s and beat a middle aged serial killer who knew genjutsu. worth every minute
This game is a masterpiece.

10 out of 10 would recommend this to anyone! Infact I Nominated This Game For The I'm Not Crying, There's Something in my Eye Award!, YOU SHOULD TOO!

It plays like street fighter, (Some of the moves are pretty similar too), And I love it. Needs multiplayer across steam though, So we can beat the hell out of eachother as Naked Japanese men.  Also occasionally has issues with rendering.. And I'm pretty sure there's no way to change resolution, or Switch to Windowed mode.
10/10 would recomend
